description: Pop along to Age UK, Hotel Street and pick up a purse bell. Have a chat with local officers and get some crime prevention advice on how to keep you and your valuables safe while out and about.
title: Purse Bell Event, Age UK

description:
Pop along to the post office in WHS Smith, Gallowtree Gate and collect a free purse bell.
Meet local officers from the city centre and have a chat about anything that concerns you.
title: Purse Bell Event, The Post Office
address: WHSmith in the Post Office, Gallowtree Gate, Leicester

description: Pop along to Leicester Market and pick up a purse bell. Have a chat with local officers and get some crime prevention advice on how to keep you and your valuables safe while out and about.
title: Purse Bell Event, Leicester Market

description:
Come along and meet a member of your local neighbourhood team and get crime prevention advice.

Sign up to Neighbourhood Link and keep informed with what's happening in your area.
title: Monthly library drop-in session
address: Leicester Central Library, Bishop Street, Leicester
